fields.title: Greenleaves Countryside Inn
fields.description:
Nestled in the serene village of Kuruthukuli in the Nilgiri Hills, Greenleaves Countryside Inn offers a tranquil escape just 8 kilometers from the Ooty bus stand and railway station. This charming inn is surrounded by picturesque tea gardens, lush shola forests, and winding paths, creating an idyllic setting for your stay.

uests can enjoy leisurely walks or cycling in the area, accompanied by the cool breeze, the gentle rustling of leaves, and the melodious songs of birds. The peaceful ambiance ensures a truly unique and refreshing experience. Ideal for families and couples, Greenleaves Countryside Inn is the perfect destination for those seeking a place with a difference.

fields.title: Green Casa
fields.description:
Escape the city's noise and embrace the tranquility of Ooty at Green Casa! Nestled amidst the charming fun city area, just 2.5 kilometers from the bustling center, Green Casa offers the perfect balance of peace and accessibility. Breathe in the crisp mountain air and listen to the occasional bird chirping – a welcome change from the city's chaos.

Green Casa welcomes you to a heritage-style stay. Enter through a traditional Kerala-style "padipura" and explore our scenic gardens. Relax in our ideally arranged cottages, each offering privacy and stunning views. We cater to all types of travelers with a variety of room options, from double bedrooms to suites, all at affordable prices without compromising on quality. Take a break from your daily routine and unwind in our well-maintained gardens. Green Casa offers comfort, happiness, and a truly unique experience amidst the beauty of the Nilgiri Hills.

fields.title: Earth Songs by the Vineyard
fields.description:
Escape the city and unwind under starry skies at our cozy vineyard bungalow! Nestled on a lush 2-acre farm, this charming getaway offers the perfect escape for families and friends. Relax in hammocks, gather around crackling campfires, or explore the property and see if you can spot some local wildlife. Inside, our 4 comfortable bedrooms, including a private studio, provide ample space to unwind after a day of adventure.

This former grape cultivation site boasts breathtaking valley views, making it a truly serene retreat. Located just 23 km from Ooty and 13 km from Kotagiri, the bungalow offers easy access to the surrounding area.  Our attentive staff is on hand to ensure your comfort, and optional meal plans take the stress out of mealtimes. Book your stay today and create lasting memories at this peaceful escape!

fields.question: What is the distance of Green Casa from the center of Ooty?
fields.answer: Green Casa is located 2.5 kilometers from the bustling center of Ooty, offering a peaceful retreat while still being easily accessible.

fields.question: What types of rooms are available at Green Casa?
fields.answer: We offer a variety of room options including double bedrooms and suites to cater to different needs and preferences

fields.question: Are the rooms at Green Casa affordable?
fields.answer: Yes, we strive to offer comfortable and high-quality accommodations at affordable prices.

fields.question: What amenities are provided in the rooms?
fields.answer: Our rooms come equipped with comfortable bedding, clean bathrooms, and beautiful views. Additional amenities include Wi-Fi, complimentary tea and coffee, and more. Please contact us for specific details about the amenities in each room type.

fields.question: Can I book a room at Green Casa for a special occasion?
fields.answer: Absolutely! Green Casa is a great place for special occasions. Feel free to contact us in advance so we can help make your celebration memorable.

fields.question: Is there parking available at Green Casa?
fields.answer: Yes, we provide ample parking space for our guests.

fields.question: Are pets allowed at Green Casa?
fields.answer: We currently do not allow pets at Green Casa to ensure the comfort and safety of all our guests.

fields.question: What activities can I enjoy during my stay?
fields.answer: You can relax in our scenic gardens, explore the beautiful Nilgiri Hills, or visit nearby attractions in Ooty.

fields.question: Is breakfast included in the stay?
fields.answer: Breakfast is not included in the standard rate. However, we can arrange breakfast for you upon request for an additional fee.

fields.question: How can I make a reservation?
fields.answer: You can make a reservation through our website, by calling us directly, or by sending us an email. We look forward to your stay!

fields.question: What amenities are available at the vineyard bungalow?
fields.answer: Our bungalow offers 4 comfortable bedrooms, including a private studio, hammocks for relaxing, campfire facilities, and breathtaking valley views. We also provide optional meal plans to take the stress out of mealtimes.

fields.question: How far is the bungalow from Ooty and Kotagiri?
fields.answer: The bungalow is located 23 km from Ooty and 13 km from Kotagiri, making it an ideal spot for exploring the surrounding areas.

fields.question: What can we do on the property?
fields.answer: Guests can relax in hammocks, gather around campfires, explore the 2-acre farm, and spot local wildlife. The property’s lush surroundings and serene environment make it perfect for unwinding and enjoying nature.

fields.question: Is the bungalow suitable for families and groups of friends?
fields.answer: Yes, the bungalow is ideal for families and groups of friends. The spacious bedrooms and comfortable living areas provide plenty of space to relax and enjoy your stay.

fields.question: What is the history of the property?
fields.answer: The property was formerly a grape cultivation site and retains its charming vineyard ambiance. Its rich history adds to the serene and unique atmosphere of the bungalow.

fields.question: : Is there staff available to assist during our stay?
fields.answer: Yes, our attentive staff is on hand to ensure your comfort and assist with any needs you may have during your stay.

fields.question: Are meal plans available?
fields.answer: Yes, we offer optional meal plans to make your stay even more convenient and stress-free. Please inquire about meal plan options when booking.

fields.question: : How can I book a stay at the vineyard bungalow?
fields.answer: You can book your stay by contacting us directly or through our website. We look forward to helping you create lasting memories at our peaceful escape.

fields.question: Is the bungalow accessible for people with disabilities?
fields.answer: Please contact us directly to discuss any specific accessibility needs you may have. We strive to accommodate all our guests to ensure a comfortable stay.

fields.question: What wildlife can we expect to see on the property?
fields.answer: The property is home to a variety of local wildlife. While we can't guarantee sightings, guests often spot birds, small mammals, and other native animals during their stay.

fields.title: Scenic Location 2.5 km from Ooty’s Center
Deluxe Room with Balcony
fields.description: 1 king size bed with attached bathroom, entrance from common hall

fields.title: Deluxe Room

fields.title: Bedroom colonial style Bungalow
fields.description: 1 bungalow with 3 bedrooms and another studio room

fields.title: Ooty lake, boat house
fields.sub_title: Boating on the man-made lake offers serene views and rich biodiversity. Enjoy a pedal boat or rowboat ride, and savor Nilgiris' delicacies at the restaurants.

fields.title: Karnataka siri horticulture Garden
fields.sub_title: Karnataka Siri Horticulture Garden, located at Fern Hill in Ooty, is 1.5 km from Ooty Lake and 3 km from Ooty Railway Station. The second-largest garden in Ooty, it’s a must-visit spot for Ooty tour packages.

fields.title: Toy train (railway station)
fields.sub_title: The Nilgiri Mountain Railway, or Toy Train in Ooty, is a UNESCO World Heritage Site since 2005. Operating since 1899, it offers a scenic journey through nature and remains a top attraction in Ooty.
fields.point_1: Unique Historical Journey at a Budget-Friendly Rate

fields.title: Botanical garden
fields.sub_title: The Botanical Garden in Ooty, one of India’s largest, is a paradise for nature lovers and those admiring exotic flora. Spanning nearly 55 hectares at the foothills of Doddabetta Peak, it offers a stunning natural retreat.

fields.title: Dodda Betta peak
fields.sub_title: Doddabetta, the highest peak in Tamil Nadu, is about 10 km from the Ooty bus stand. Its name means "Big Mountain" in the Badugu language. Located at the junction of the Western and Eastern Ghats,it offers stunning views of the Nilgiri Hills

fields.title: Rose garden
fields.sub_title: Situated in central Ooty, this terraced garden features rose tunnels, pergolas, and rose-creeper bowers. Established at Vijayanagaram to commemorate the centenary Flower Show, the Rose Park spans 4 hectares across five terraces.

fields.title: Pine forest
fields.sub_title: The pine forests of Kodaikanal, a photographer's paradise, offer a mesmerizing ambiance and a gift of Mother Nature. Enjoy nature walks, photography, or horse rides along trails amidst the towering pine trees.

fields.title: Kamaraj Sagar dam
fields.sub_title: Kamaraj Sagar Dam, also known as Sandynalla Reservoir, is a popular spot 10 km from Ooty bus stand in Tamil Nadu's Nilgiris district. It's famous for picnics, film shoots, and stunning views, drawing many visitors.

fields.title: 9 th mile shooting point
fields.sub_title: 9th Mile is a scenic spot just 9 miles from Ooty city, offering stunning views. Close to Pykara, it’s known as “Shooting Medu” and is surrounded by lush greenery, mountains, and dense forest.

fields.title: Pykara waterfalls
fields.sub_title: Pykara is a picturesque village and river 19 km from Ooty, Tamil Nadu. The Pykara reservoir features a boat house, a restaurant, and offers motor boat rides (20 minutes) and speed boat rides (10 minutes).

fields.title: Pykara boat house
fields.sub_title: Pykara, a village and river 19 km from Ooty in Tamil Nadu, offers a boat house on the Pykara reservoir. Visitors can enjoy a 20-minute motor boat ride or a 10-minute speed boat ride, with well-protected fenced shoals and a restaurant on sit

fields.title: Needle rock view point
fields.sub_title: Needle Rock offers a stunning 360-degree view of the Nilgiris. More than just a viewpoint, it’s a beautiful destination with a scenic drive from Ooty as a major highlight.
fields.place: Ooty Main Road, NH67, Tamil Nadu

fields.title: Valley view point
fields.sub_title: Ketti Valley View Point, just 4 km from Ooty and 12.5 km from Coonoor on the Ooty-Coonoor Road, offers stunning views and is a top spot for Ooty tourism.

fields.title: MRC (outside view)
fields.sub_title: Crossing this road is a unique experience, offering a glimpse into the pride and sacrifice of our army. While entry is restricted, the opportunity to pay your respects is special.

fields.title: Sims park
fields.sub_title: Sim’s Park in Coonoor, established in 1847, is a 12-hectare botanical garden known for its Queensland Kauri Pine, Rudraksha, and Handsome Ornamental Tree.

fields.title: Conoor Dolphin nose
fields.sub_title: Located about 12 km from Coonoor bus stand near Tiger Hills, this unique rock formation offers a grand view of the surrounding ravines and the magnificent St.

fields.title: Lambs rock
fields.sub_title: Lamb’s Rock in Coonoor offers stunning views of the peaks and valleys, with a chance to spot waterfalls from the summit. It’s a popular spot for picnics and sunset views with family and friends.

fields.title: Discover the Latest at Greenleaves Holiday Homes
fields.description: Stay updated with the latest news, special offers, and exciting updates from Greenleaves Holiday Homes. Whether it’s new features at our retreat, upcoming events, or seasonal promotions, this is your go-to spot for everything happening at our serene getaway. Join our community and be the first to know about our newest initiatives and exclusive opportunities to enhance your experience with us.

fields.title: Greenleaves News & Announcements
fields.description: Welcome to the Greenleaves News & Announcements page! Here, you’ll find updates about our latest developments, special events, and exclusive offers. Our team is always working on new ways to make your stay even more enjoyable, and we’re excited to share these moments with you. Check back often to discover what’s new at Greenleaves Holiday Homes!

fields.title: Stay in the Know with Greenleaves Holiday Homes
fields.description: Be the first to hear about our latest news, upcoming events, and special promotions! Our News and Updates page keeps you informed about everything happening at Greenleaves Holiday Homes. From new features and enhancements to seasonal events, you’ll find all the information you need to make the most of your stay with us.

fields.title: Tranquil Luxury at Greenleaves Retreat
fields.sub_title: Escape to Nature's Embrace

fields.title: A Serene Retreat in the Heart of Nature
fields.content: Green leaves is a home away from home. I and my family loved the place. Located right in the middle of tea garden, the property is serene and beautiful. Mr amir and mr sutheer were very helpful with everything, food and local information on places to visit. They even took care of the car parking. There is a small library in the property and games like carrom board to sit back and relax. The property also arranges for bonfire to make it an awesome evening. If you are lucky (like we were, you will find deer and sambar venturing right in the backyard.
fields.name: Vikas Gautham

fields.title: Experience True Ooty Charm at Greenleaves Holiday Home
fields.content: There can't be any better place than green leaves in ooty, people may have opinion on distance from city centre, but this property gives you what is expected from ooty. Excellent place with excellent people.
fields.name: Abhishek Prahladka

fields.title: Wonderful Stay with a Focus on Safety, Comfort, and Delicious Food!
fields.content: It was a very pleasant stay with the best service, and the surroundings were so peaceful. Very safe for female travellers too. You should try the tandoori chicken on BBQ one of the best. Breakfast was good as well. "Money well spent"
fields.name: Prem kumar guruvel

fields.title: Nature, Hospitality, and Relaxation: Our Memorable Stay at Greenleaves
fields.content: We were to stay here for two days but this place was such a stress buster that we ended us extending your stay. One of the finest location i have ever stayed at, surrounded with tea garden and forests. We saw deers as we lifted the curtain from our window itself. At night this place is lit with lights surrounding the entire property. We enjoyed bonfire and barbecue as well. Less number of occupants was also a plus point. Infact, for two days me and my wife were the only guest. You are with the nature at this place, lots of birds always to accompany you around. For two days we did nothing in Ooty, just stayed at this beautiful place, observed the nature and observed ourself. We also went for cycling around the place. Not to forget the best part of our stay was the hospitality of the caretaker Aamir and the cook who cooks some really delicious food, very very caring and a joy to be around with. I would wish them a great life and pray that we meet again soon.
fields.name: Swastik Sharma

fields.title: A Memorable Christmas and New Year Stay!
fields.content: Awesome stay. Very nice place. Homely food and feel. We enjoyed a lot. All the staffs are very good. They managed very well during this Christmas and new year season. 👍👍👍👍😊
fields.name: Ashmar Hashim

fields.title: A Wonderful Stay for Families with Kids
fields.content: pleasant stay. Good location for family outing It was good experience for my kid as well. Good view with swing in garden
fields.name: Santhosh Gaikwad

fields.title: Highly Recommended: A Perfect Stay with Excellent Amenities and Service
fields.content: Everything about this place was absolutely fantastic - the location, the property's amenities and cleanliness, the food and the caretakers were really helpful in taking care of all our requests. Highly recommended!
fields.name: krishna

fields.title: A Serene Mountain Getaway with Stunning Views and Delicious Meals
fields.content:
My stay at this serene mountain retreat was truly wonderful. Overlooking Kukal Valley, the house offers breathtaking mountain views from the studio bedroom and main house porch. Sitting on the porch, watching the mist roll over the hills, was a highlight.
Our host, Anu, was exceptionally attentive, addressing any issues promptly. The delicious meals prepared by the chef significantly enhanced our experience.
fields.name: Vishnu

fields.title: Affordable Comfort with Beautiful Views and Easy Access
fields.content: To start off, the view from the stay was amazing. The prices for stay is affordable. There was no WiFi available but the room service was good. There is an auto stand and a bus stand just 50 meters away from the stay. Swiggy deliveries are done to this location. There is parking space available. Places to visit in ooty are nearby this stay.
fields.name: Sameer Mysore

fields.title: Satisfying Stay with Clean Rooms and Welcoming Staf
fields.content: I’ve came to the property very late at the night. The property is very close to the main road and it was very helpful at that time of our arrival. Staffs were very helpful at that late night also. The rooms were well maintained and clean. They even have a very spacious parking l. Over all i was very satisfied.
fields.name: Zami

fields.title: Exceptional Service and Prime Location for Families
fields.content: The staff was really helpful, Room maintained well with good hygiene. Location is closer to main town and approachable to site seeing locations. However, it is a bit out of the hustle and bustle of the town, Breakfast is very special and value for money. They accommodate families only, not bachelors and unmarried
fields.name: Sahood

fields.title: A Homely Retreat with Beautiful Terrace Views at Chill Inn Villa
fields.content: We stayed at the Chill Inn Villa. It’s very spacious and homely. Lovely views from the top terrace. The staff are very courteous and prompt with service.
fields.name: Gopalan Natarajan

fields.title: Well-Maintained Cottages with Great Amenities for Families
fields.content: Family friendly cottages with all basic amenities covered. Located at an area closer to restaurants and auto, bus stops easier for commutation too. They provided RO drinking water, hot water for drinking on request. All area within cottage was maintained neat and clean. Also comes under budget. Rooms were bigger than other hotel rooms and twin rooms come with a small hall area too, which is so good and convenient for families to spend time together. TV is provided too with local channels.
fields.name: Globetrotter Priya

fields.title: Exceptional Host and Comfortable Stay in Oot
fields.content: The host was extremely helpful. Arranged a cab for us for sightseeing upon request at a very reasonable price. Requested for an early check-in, and the host accommodated for a small extra fee. The property is near the ooty main bus station. stay was comfortable overall!! and special thanks to the host for accommodating our requests.
fields.name: Divya

fields.question: What types of accommodations do you offer at Greenleaves Holiday Homes?
fields.answer: We offer a variety of luxurious accommodations, including private villas, cottages, and suites. Each option is designed to provide comfort and relaxation, with amenities that cater to your every need.

fields.question: How can I make a reservation?
fields.answer: Reservations can be made through our website, by phone, or via email. Simply choose your preferred dates and accommodation type, and our team will assist you with the booking process.

fields.question: What amenities are available at Greenleaves Holiday Homes?
fields.answer: Our amenities include private pools, spa services, fine dining, fitness centers, and guided nature tours. Each accommodation is also equipped with modern conveniences such as Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and fully stocked kitchens.

fields.question: Is Greenleaves Holiday Homes family-friendly?
fields.answer: Yes, we are a family-friendly destination. We offer a range of activities and amenities suitable for guests of all ages, including children's play areas, family excursions, and babysitting services.

fields.question: Are pets allowed at your holiday homes?
fields.answer: We understand that pets are part of the family, and we have designated pet-friendly accommodations. Please inform us during the booking process if you will be bringing a pet.

fields.question: What activities can guests enjoy during their stay?
fields.answer: Guests can enjoy a variety of activities, such as hiking, cycling, bird watching, yoga sessions, and cooking classes. We also offer excursions to nearby attractions and cultural sites.

fields.title: Welcome to Greenleaves Holiday Homes
fields.meta_title: Greenleaves Holiday Homes - Your Perfect Getaway
fields.meta_description: Experience luxury and simplicity at Greenleaves Holiday Homes. Enjoy exceptional hospitality in a serene, natural setting, perfect for unwinding and rejuvenating.

fields.title: Guest-Centricity
fields.description: We obsess over exceeding guest expectations and creating lasting memories, while upholding ethical business practices.

fields.title: Authentic Experiences
fields.description: We connect guests with the heart and soul of each destination, ensuring fair compensation and representation of local communities.

fields.title: Sustainable Practices
fields.description: We minimize our environmental impact and empower responsible travel, adhering to ethical sourcing and responsible waste management.

fields.title: Collaborative Spirit
fields.description: We believe in the power of partnerships to create a better future, fostering ethical and transparent relationships with all stakeholders.

fields.title: Diversity and Inclusion
fields.description: We embrace diversity and ensure inclusive experiences for our guests and team members.

fields.title: Innovation and Excellence
fields.description: We strive for excellence and continuously seek innovative ways to improve and enhance our offerings.

fields.title: Empowering People
fields.description: We invest in our team members' growth and well-being, fostering a positive and rewarding work environment, and upholding fair labor practices and equal opportunities.
